summary.description:
CellCountCV – a web-application for accurate cell counting and automated batch processing of microscopy images using fully-convolutional neural networks.

This repository contains the code and examples accompaining our preprint https://doi.org/10.1101/867218.

Working_with_CellCounter.ipynb — this notebook contains the examples of pretrained FCNN model usage in Python and through JSON-RPC calls to CellCountCV
summary.name: CellCountCV
